python: 1. a large heavy-bodied non-venomous; 2. a high-level general-purpose programming language.
xml: Meaning: (noun) a metalanguage which allows users to define their own customized markup languages, especially in order to display documents on the internet.
json: Meaning: (noun) is an open standard file format, and data interchange format, that uses human-readable text to store and transmit data objects.
